item.title: Man Discovers "Mystery Cave", Pours Coke in, and Out Came the "Beast"!
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 2020-11-24 20:31:37 Source: Colorful Kite Tour says Report **Man discovers “mystery cave”, pours Coke in, and out comes the “beast”! *** Burrows are a great hiding place for many creatures. A small anteater was looking for ants when it was discovered by a hyena. The anteater was no match for the hyena and found a burrow when it was about to lose its life, and dug in to avoid the hyena’s pursuit.
